title: "Five-Layer Architecture"

## AI Operation Lab Five-Layer Architecture

AI Cooperation's system is built on a five-layer architecture, where each layer builds upon the previous one.

## L1 — Learning Environment

> Enable people to "dare to use, know how to use, and not fear making mistakes"

- Provide safe AI interaction spaces
- Simulate real work scenarios
- All operations are traceable and replayable
- Lower the psychological barrier to first-time AI use

**Problem Solved**: "I don't know how to start"

## L2 — Operation Method

> Enable people to "design AI work methods"

- **Task Decomposition** — Break complex work into AI-executable steps
- **Human-AI Division** — Clearly define what humans and AI are each responsible for
- **Agent Collaboration** — Design multi-agent cooperative logic
- **AI Decision Boundaries** — Define the scope of AI autonomous decisions
- **Error Correction & Validation** — Establish quality control mechanisms

**Problem Solved**: "AI can't really help me"

## L3 — Evolution Path

> Give organizations the "ability to continuously evolve"

- **AI Maturity Assessment** — Quantify the organization's current AI capability
- **Process Restructuring** — Redesign workflows for human-AI collaboration
- **Long-term AI Roadmap** — Phased, progressive adoption strategy
- **Talent & Role Redesign** — Redefine job roles for the AI era

**Problem Solved**: "How to not be replaced by AI"

## L4 — Skill System

> Transform methodology into deployable modules

- Follow standardized Skill module structure
- Each skill is independent, testable, and reusable
- Includes AI agent behavior specs + domain knowledge + execution tools
- Pipeline orchestration supports multi-step, multi-agent collaboration

**Problem Solved**: "How to make methodology actionable"

## L5 — Enterprise Adoption

> Bring the system into organizations

- Phase 1: Deploy learning AI environment + employee trial
- Phase 2: Workflow restructuring + Agent adoption experiments
- Phase 3: Establish internal AI standards + maturity assessment + long-term evolution

**Problem Solved**: "How to get the entire organization onboard"

## Layer Dependencies

```
L5 Enterprise Adoption
    ↑ depends on
L4 Skill System
    ↑ depends on
L3 Evolution Path
    ↑ depends on
L2 Operation Method
    ↑ depends on
L1 Learning Environment
```

Each layer builds on the foundation of the previous one, forming a sustainable AI capability growth system.
